name: Frozen Watermelon Daiquiris

ingredients.name: 1-inch-cubed seedless watermelon 3 1 2 pounds
ingredients.original_string: 10 cups 1-inch-cubed seedless watermelon (3 1/2 pounds, from a watermelon that is at least 7 pounds)

ingredients.name: white rum
ingredients.original_string: 1 1/2 cups white rum, plus more if desired

ingredients.name: freshly squeezed lime juice from about 6 limes
ingredients.original_string: 2/3 cup freshly squeezed lime juice (from about 6 limes), plus lime wedges for garnish

ingredients.name: 1/2 cup simple syrup or light agave syrup
ingredients.original_string: 1/2 cup simple syrup or light agave syrup

ingredients.name: kosher salt such as diamond crystal
ingredients.original_string: 1/2 teaspoon kosher salt (such as Diamond Crystal)

instructions: Spread the watermelon cubes on a sheet pan or other tray and freeze until firm, about 3 hours. Once the cubes are frozen, transfer them to a freezer-safe container and store for up to 1 week.

Place 5 cups of the frozen watermelon cubes in a blender. Blend on low to crush some of the watermelon cubes. (It’s OK if they aren’t uniformly crushed.) Add 3/4 cup rum, 1/3 cup lime juice, 1/4 simple syrup and 1/4 teaspoon salt. Blend on low, raising the speed and pausing to stir if necessary, until thick and slushy in texture.
Pour the mixture into 3 glasses and repeat with the remaining 5 cups watermelon, 3/4 cup rum, 1/3 cup lime juice, 1/4 cup simple syrup and 1/4 teaspoon salt to make a second batch.
Serve the drinks cold, finished with an additional splash of rum if desired and garnished with lime wedges.
